text: How to disable auto play, but user can still play/pause manualy? or disable auto play when network is on GPRS, and enabl auto play when on WIFI or 4G?
title: How to disable auto play

text: @j3p0n You can have your own **Strategy** which does nothing, for example a **lazyStrategy**. So when you want to disable auto playback, just call **Toro.setStrategy(lazyStrategy)**. See how I implement **Toro.rest(boolean)** for more information.
